title: Breakouts, Busts, Thrills and Spills: Roglič Rules Vuelta, But How Does it Rate?
content:
Tour de Hoody: From brutal heat to near-record attrition, a chaotic Vuelta delivered non-stop thrills, but missed out on a larger narrative to make it great.

Read the full article at Breakouts, Busts, Thrills and Spills: Roglič Rules Vuelta, But How Does it Rate? on Velo.
author: ahood
